question: What are the key benefits of meditation according to recent scientific studies?
true_answer: Recent scientific studies highlight benefits of meditation such as stress reduction, improved emotional health, enhanced self-awareness, lengthened attention span, and reduced age-related memory loss.

steps.description: Research recent scientific studies on meditation

plan.current_objective: Understand key benefits of meditation from recent studies

memory_state.shared_knowledge: Meditation benefits include stress reduction, improved emotional health, and more.
